  • Method Details

    • randName

      private static String randName(String user)
      Generate recursively a random name from the enum Name class excluding the already generated names and the user name
      Parameters:
      user - is the name to exclude
      Returns:
      an Random Name

    • resetRandomNameGenerator

      public static void resetRandomNameGenerator()
      this method reset the random name generator setting again all the names in the array list

    • play

      public void play()
      Method by which all the Npc play their turns

      When they will draw a card from 1 to 10 the system automatically switch it if their card in that position is still hidden. Else if they will draw a king or jolly a random generator will choose an hidden position to place it
